# Label Recommendations for UC OSPO Education Repo

## Current Labels (Good to Keep)
- `education` - Keep as primary project label
- `feature` - Good
- `bug` - Standard
- `documentation` - Keep
- `good first issue` - Important for students!
- `help wanted` - Good for collaboration

## Recommended New Labels for Student Work

### Priority Labels
- `priority: critical` (color: #d73a4a) - Must complete before launch
- `priority: high` (color: #ff9800) - Important for Phase 2
- `priority: medium` (color: #ffc107) - Nice to have
- `priority: low` (color: #4caf50) - Future enhancement

### Work Type Labels
- `type: data-quality` (color: #006b75) - Data cleaning/improvements
- `type: content` (color: #0e8a16) - Writing content, descriptions
- `type: testing` (color: #fbca04) - Testing and QA
- `type: deployment` (color: #1d76db) - Deployment and CI/CD

### Phase Labels (for planning)
- `phase-1-mvp` (color: #0366d6) - MVP work (COMPLETED)
- `phase-2-enhancement` (color: #5319e7) - January student work
- `phase-3-advanced` (color: #a2eeef) - Future features

### Area Labels
- `area: homepage` (color: #c2e0c6)
- `area: pathways` (color: #bfdadc)
- `area: lessons` (color: #d4c5f9)
- `area: data` (color: #e99695)
- `area: filters` (color: #f9d0c4)

### Student-Specific
- `student-ready` (color: #7057ff) - Ready for student to pick up
- `student-assigned` (color: #d876e3) - Currently being worked on
- `blocked` (color: #d93f0b) - Can't progress, waiting on something

## Labels to Remove/Consolidate
- `gap analysis` → merge into `type: data-quality`
- `refactor` → use `type: refactor`
- `filtering` → use `area: filters`
- `homepage` → use `area: homepage`
- `css`, `ui/ux`, `design` → consolidate into `type: ui/ux`
- `data` → use `area: data` or `type: data-quality`
- `performance` → use `enhancement` with note
- `accessibility` → keep but rename to `a11y`
